name: Moonchalk or "A Minimal Escape Room Short Game"
name_original: Moonchalk or "A Minimal Escape Room Short Game"
description:
An unnamed and silent protagonist was trapped in a pixel-circle minimalistic room called "Moonchalk".

STATS:

  • Maps: 1
  • Events: 10
  • Variables: 3
  • Switches: 3
  • Actors: 1
  • Items: 6

It takes less than five minutes to finish this game, but with a little bit twist.
